From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Thursday, 26 June 2025 at 12:53 pm
To: Nansi Philips <nansi.philips@aussieindustries.com.au>
Cc: Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Aussie Industries | Clarity Insights


Hi Nansi,

For the Google Reviews widget, we'd use Elfsight (it's a reliable option we've used with other clients and allows us to pull in live reviews and style them consistently with the site.


Here's a quick example from another brand we've worked with to give you an idea of how it could look.

https://littlescribblers.com.au/

Let us know if you're happy to proceed with this one and we'll get it installed in place of the existing reviews widget on the homepage.

Thanks,
Andy
